trans-unit.source: Displays the values of a single record from a data source in a table, where each data row represents a field of the record.
trans-unit.target: Viser verdiene i én post fra en datakilde i en tabell der hver datarad representerer et felt i oppføringen.

trans-unit.source: The DetailsView control allows you to edit, delete, and insert records.
trans-unit.target: DetailsView kontroll lar deg redigere, sletting og innsetting poster.

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Row Fields](#row_fields) - [Binding to Data](#binding_to_data) - [Security](#security) - [Data Operations](#data_operations) - [Customizing the User Interface](#customizing_the_user_interface) - [Events](#events) - [Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## Introduction The DetailsView control is used to display a single record from a data source in a table, where each field of the record is displayed in a row of the table.
trans-unit.target: I dette emnet:- [Introduksjon](#introduction) - [radfelt](#row_fields) - [Binding til Data](#binding_to_data) - [sikkerhet](#security) - [av data](#data_operations) - [tilpasse brukergrensesnittet](#customizing_the_user_interface) - [hendelser](#events) - [tilgjengelighet](#Accessibility) - [deklarerende syntaksen](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## innføring i DetailsView kontroll brukes til å vise én post fra en datakilde i en tabell der hvert felt i oppføringen vises i en rad i tabellen.

trans-unit.source: It can be used in combination with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control for master-detail scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes sammen med en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen overordnet detaljert scenarioer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The DetailsView control supports the following features: - Binding to data source controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen DetailsView støtter følgende funksjoner: - Binding til kontroller for datakilden, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: - Built-in inserting capabilities.
trans-unit.target: -Innebygde funksjoner for innsetting.

trans-unit.source: - Built-in updating and deleting capabilities.
trans-unit.target: -Innebygde oppdatering og sletting av funksjoner.

trans-unit.source: - Built-in paging capabilities.
trans-unit.target: -Innebygde Bla-funksjoner.

trans-unit.source: - Programmatic access to the DetailsView object model to dynamically set properties, handle events, and so on.
trans-unit.target: -Programmatisk tilgang til DetailsView objektmodellen kan angi egenskaper, dynamisk håndtere hendelser og så videre.

trans-unit.source: - Customizable appearance through themes and styles.
trans-unit.target: – Tilpasningsbart utseende via tema og stiler.

trans-unit.source: ## Row Fields Each data row in the DetailsView control is created by declaring a field control.
trans-unit.target: ## Rad felt hver dataraden i DetailsView kontrollen er opprettet av deklarerer en.

trans-unit.source: Different row field types determine the behavior of the rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: Feltet for forskjellige radtyper bestemmer virkemåte rader i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Field controls derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>.
trans-unit.target: Feltkontroller avledes fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different row field types that can be used.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser annen rad felttyper som kan brukes.

trans-unit.source: |Column field type|Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>|Displays the value of a field in a data source as text.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>|Displays a command button in the DetailsView control.
trans-unit.target: | Feltet kolonnetypen | Beskrivelse | |-----------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>| Viser verdien for et felt i en datakilde som tekst. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>| Viser en kommandoknapp i kontrollen DetailsView.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to display a row with a custom button control, such as an Add or a Remove button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>|Displays a check box in the DetailsView control.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg vise en rad med en egendefinert knappekontrollen, for eksempel en Legg til eller Fjern-knappen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>| Viser en avmerkingsboks i kontrollen DetailsView.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>

trans-unit.source: This row field type is commonly used to display fields with a Boolean value.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>|Displays built-in command buttons to perform edit, insert, or delete operations in the DetailsView control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkField>|Displays the value of a field in a data source as a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: Denne raden felttypen brukes vanligvis til å vise felt med en boolsk verdi. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>| Viser innebygd kommando knappene for å utføre Rediger og sette inn eller slette operasjoner i kontrollen DetailsView. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkField>| Viser verdien for et felt i en datakilde som en hyperkobling.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: This row field type allows you to bind a second field to the hyperlink's URL.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>|Displays an image in the DetailsView control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>|Displays user-defined content for a row in the DetailsView control according to a specified template.
trans-unit.target: Denne raden felttypen kan du binde et annet felt til hyperkoblingen URL-adresse. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>| Viser et bilde i kontrollen DetailsView. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>| Viser en brukerdefinert innhold for en rad i DetailsView kontrollen i henhold til en angitt mal.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: This row field type allows you to create a custom row field.| By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A> property is set to `true`, which automatically generates a bound row field object for each field of a bindable type in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Denne raden felttypen kan du opprette en egendefinert rad-felt. | Som standard i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>er satt til `true`, som automatisk genererer en bundne feltet radobjektet for hvert felt av en type som kan bindes i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: Valid bindable types are <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Guid>, and the set of primitive types.
trans-unit.target: Gyldige typer som kan bindes er <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Guid>, og sett med primitive typer.</xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Each field is then displayed in a row as text, in the order in which each field appears in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Hvert felt er vil vises i en rad som tekst i rekkefølgen som vises hvert felt i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Automatically generating the rows provides a quick and easy way to display every field in the record.
trans-unit.target: Automatisk generering av radene gir en rask og enkel måte å vise alle feltene i oppføringen.

trans-unit.source: However, to make use of the DetailsView control's advanced capabilities you must explicitly declare the row fields to include in the DetailsView control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke DetailsView Avansert kontrollens funksjonene må du eksplisitt deklarere radfeltene som skal inkluderes i DetailsView kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: To declare the row fields, first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Å deklarere feltene raden må du først angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, add opening and closing `<Fields>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the DetailsView control.
trans-unit.target: Legg til neste åpner og lukker `<Fields>` koder mellom innledende og avsluttende koder kontrollens DetailsView.

trans-unit.source: Finally, list the row fields that you want to include between the opening and closing `<Fields>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Vis til slutt radfelt som du vil inkludere mellom innledende og avsluttende `<Fields>` koder.

trans-unit.source: The row fields specified are added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> collection in the order listed.
trans-unit.target: Raden feltene som er angitt, er lagt til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>samling i rekkefølgen som vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> collection allows you to programmatically manage the row fields in the DetailsView control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>samlingen kan du administrere programmatisk radfelt i DetailsView-kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Automatically generated row fields are not added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Automatisk genererte radfelt er ikke lagt til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Explicitly declared row fields can be displayed in combination with automatically generated row fields.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Eksplisitt deklarert radfelt kan vises i kombinasjon med automatisk genererte radfelt.

trans-unit.source: When both are used, explicitly declared row fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated row fields.
trans-unit.target: Når både, eksplisitt deklarerte radfelt gjengis først etterfulgt av automatisk genererte radfelt.

trans-unit.source: ## Binding to Data The DetailsView control can be bound to a data source control (such as the control or control) or to any data source collection that implements the interface, such as , , , or other collection types.
trans-unit.target: ## Bindingen til Data i DetailsView kontrollen kan være bundet til en kilde-kontroll for data (som den kontrollen eller kontrollen) eller kildesamlingen alle data som implementerer den grensesnitt som , , , eller andre samlingstyper.

trans-unit.source: Use one of the following methods to bind the DetailsView control to the appropriate data source type: - To bind to a data source control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property of the DetailsView control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> value of the data source control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk en av følgende metoder for å binde DetailsView kontrollen til den riktige datakildetypen: – å binde til en kilde-kontroll for data må du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>DetailsView kontrollen til den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>verdien kontrollens datakilde.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DetailsView control automatically binds to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen DetailsView binding automatisk til den angitte datakildekontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred method to bind to data.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden ikke binde til data.

trans-unit.source: - To bind to a data source that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> interface, programmatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property of the DetailsView control to the data source and then call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Skal bindes til en datakilde som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnitt angir programmatisk i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>for DetailsView kontrollere til datakilden, og kaller den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information on data binding, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om databinding, se [Binding til databaser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).

trans-unit.source: ## Security This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: ## Sikkerhet kontrollen kan brukes til å vise brukerinndata, som kan inneholde skadelig klientskript.

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller informasjonen som ble sendt fra en klient for kjørbare skript, SQL-setninger eller annen kode før det blir vist i programmet.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET gir et inndataforespørselen valideringsfunksjonen til å blokkere skript og HTML i brukerinndata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [skriptet utnytter oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input.
trans-unit.target: Validering serverkontroller leveres også for å vurdere brukerinndata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [validering Server kontrollen syntaks](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133).

trans-unit.source: ## Data Operations The DetailsView control provides built-in capabilities that allow the user to update, delete, insert, and page through items in the control.
trans-unit.target: ## Data operasjoner DetailsView kontrollen har innebygde funksjoner som tillater brukeren å oppdatere, slette, insert og bla gjennom elementer i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When the DetailsView control is bound to a data source control, the DetailsView control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic updating, deleting, inserting, and paging functionality.
trans-unit.target: Når kontrollen DetailsView er bundet til en kilde-kontroll for data, kan DetailsView kontrollen dra nytte av datakilden kontrollens funksjoner og angi automatisk oppdatering, slette, innsetting og bla funksjonalitet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The DetailsView control can provide support for update, delete, insert, and paging operations with other types of data sources; however, you must provide the implementation for these operations in an appropriate event handler.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For DetailsView kontrollen kan gir støtte for oppdatering, innsetting og Slett sidevekslingsoperasjoner med andre typer datakilder; imidlertid du må angi implementering for disse operasjonene i en passende hendelsesbehandling.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>

trans-unit.source: The DetailsView control can automatically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> row field with an Edit, Delete, or New button by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateEditButton%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateInsertButton%2A> properties to `true`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen DetailsView kan automatisk legge til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>radfelt med en Rediger, Slett eller ny knapp ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateEditButton%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateInsertButton%2A>egenskapene som skal `true`henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateInsertButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateEditButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: Unlike the Delete button (which deletes the selected record immediately), when the Edit or New button is clicked, the DetailsView control goes into edit or insert mode, respectively.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning til med å slette knappen (som sletter den valgte posten umiddelbart), når du redigere eller ny-knappen, DetailsView kontrollen går til Rediger eller Sett inn modus henholdsvis.

trans-unit.source: In edit mode, the Edit button is replaced with an Update and a Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: I redigeringsmodus erstattes Rediger med en oppdatering og Avbryt-knappen.

trans-unit.source: Input controls that are appropriate for the field's data type (such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> or a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control) are displayed with a field's value for the user to modify.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller som passer for feltets datatype-inndata (som en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>kontrollen) vises med feltverdien for brukeren å endre.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Update button updates the record in the data source, while clicking the Cancel button abandons any changes.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du klikker oppdateringsknappen oppdaterer post i datakilden, mens å klikke Avbryt opphever økten endringer.

trans-unit.source: Likewise, in insert mode, the New button is replaced with an Insert and a Cancel button, and empty input controls are displayed for the user to enter the values for the new record.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte ny erstattes med en Insert- og Avbryt-knappen i insert-modus, og tom inndata kontroller vises for brukeren å angi verdiene for den nye posten.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can also manually define the update, delete, and insert command buttons in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> row field.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Kan du også definere manuelt update, delete og insert kommandoknappene i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>rad.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>

trans-unit.source: The DetailsView control recognizes buttons with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property set to "Edit", "Update", "Delete", "New", "Insert", or "Cancel"; however, you still must provide the functionality yourself.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen DetailsView gjenkjenner knapper med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>egenskapen satt til "Rediger", "Oppdatering", "Delete", "ny", "Insert" eller "Avbryt"; imidlertid fremdeles må du oppgi funksjonaliteten selv.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>

trans-unit.source: The DetailsView control provides a paging feature, which allows the user to navigate to other records in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen DetailsView gir en Bla-funksjonen, som tillater brukeren å navigere til andre poster i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: When enabled, page navigation controls are displayed in a pager row.
trans-unit.target: Når aktivert, vises Sidenavigeringskontrollene vises i en personsøker rad.

trans-unit.source: To enable paging, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil aktivere Bla, angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: The pager row can be customized using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerSettings%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Raden personsøker kan tilpasses ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerStyle%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerSettings%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerSettings%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Customizing the User Interface You can customize the appearance of the DetailsView control by setting the style properties for different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: ## Tilpasse bruker grensesnittet du kan tilpasse utseendet til DetailsView-kontroll ved å angi stilegenskaper for ulike deler av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the style properties that you can set.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser stilegenskaper som kan angis.

trans-unit.source: |Style property|Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>|The style settings for the alternating data rows in the DetailsView control.
trans-unit.target: | Style-egenskapen | Beskrivelse | |--------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for vekslende datarader DetailsView kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set, the data rows are displayed in bands, alternating between the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RowStyle%2A> settings and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> settings.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CommandRowStyle%2A>|The style settings for the row that contains the built-in command buttons.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EditRowStyle%2A>|The style settings for the data rows when the DetailsView control is in edit mode.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>|The style settings for the empty data row that are displayed in the DetailsView control when the data source does not contain any records.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A>|The style settings for the footer row.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderStyle%2A>|The style settings for the header row.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InsertRowStyle%2A>|The style settings for the data rows when the DetailsView control is in insert mode.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerStyle%2A>|The style settings for the pager row.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RowStyle%2A>|The style settings for the data rows in the DetailsView control.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er angitt, dataradene vises i verdiområder veksling mellom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RowStyle%2A>-Innstillinger og innstillinger for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CommandRowStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for raden som inneholder knappene innebygd kommando. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EditRowStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for datarader når kontrollen DetailsView er i redigeringsmodus. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for tom dataraden som vises i DetailsView kontrollere når datakilden ikke inneholder noen poster. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for bunntekstraden. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for overskriftsraden. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InsertRowStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for datarader når kontrollen DetailsView er i Sett inn-modus. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for raden personsøker. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RowStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for datarader DetailsView kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RowStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InsertRowStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EditRowStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CommandRowStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the property is also set, the data rows are displayed alternating between the settings and the settings.| ||The style settings for the header column.| ## Events The DetailsView control provides several events that you can program against.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen også er angitt, vises dataradene veksling mellom -Innstillinger og innstillinger for . | | | Stilinnstillingene for topp-kolonne. | ## Hendelser i DetailsView kontrollen inneholder flere hendelser som du kan programmer mot.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du kjører en egendefinert rutine når det oppstår en hendelse.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events supported by the DetailsView control.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hendelser som støttes av DetailsView kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DetailsView control also inherits these events from its base classes: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBound>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Disposed>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen DetailsView arver også disse hendelsene fra grunnklassene: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBound>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Disposed>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Disposed> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBound> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>

trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å kontrollere resultatet av sletteoperasjonen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>| Forekommer når brukeren klikker en Delete-knapp, men før DetailsView kontrollen sletter fra datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>

trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen ofte brukes til å utføre en oppgave når kontrollen DetailsView endres modi. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>| Forekommer før DetailsView kontrollen endrer adgangsmodi (Rediger, innsetting eller read-only-modus).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel a mode change.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanged>|Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the DetailsView control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å avbryte en endring. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanged>| Forekommer når en av knappene personsøker klikkes, men når kontrollen DetailsView behandler Bla-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different record in the control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanging>|Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the DetailsView control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen brukes vanligvis når du trenger å utføre en oppgave når brukeren navigerer til en annen post i kontrollen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanging>| Forekommer når en av knappene personsøker klikkes, men før DetailsView behandler kontrollen Bla-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanging>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.| ## Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å avbryte operasjonen Bla. | ## Tilgjengelighet For informasjon om hvordan du konfigurerer denne kontrollen, slik at den genererer markup som overholder tilgjengelighet standarder se [tilgjengelighet i Visual Studio og ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [ASP.NET-kontroller og tilgjengelighet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ```
trans-unit.target: ## Deklarerende syntaks.```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: To dynamically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to a page, create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> object, set its properties, and then add it to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection of a container control, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder>.
trans-unit.target: Legge til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll på en side, Opprett en ny <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>objekt, angi egenskapene for og deretter legge den til <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>samlingen for en beholderkontroll, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> dynamisk

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the paging feature is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om Bla-funksjonen er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control has built-in paging capabilities, which allow a user to navigate to a different record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen har innebygd Bla funksjoner, som tillater brukeren å navigere til en annen post i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control can perform both user interface (UI) and data source paging.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen kan utføre både brukergrensesnittet (UI) og datakilde Bla.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The UI paging feature can be used with any data source object that supports the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Brukergrensesnittet Bla-funksjonen kan bare brukes med alle datakildeobjektet som støtter det <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For each paging operation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control queries the data source for the entire data collection and selects the row to display, essentially discarding the remaining data.
trans-unit.target: For hver Bla-operasjon i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollerer spørringer datakilden for hele datainnsamlingen og velger raden skal vises, utelater i hovedsak den gjenværende data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: If a data source implements <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanPage%2A> property returns `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control will use data source paging instead of UI paging.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en datakilde implementerer <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanPage%2A>returnerer `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen bruker datakilde bla i stedet for Brukergrensesnittet Bla.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanPage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control will query for only the row needed for each paging operation.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen skal spørre etter bare raden som er nødvendig for hver Bla-operasjon.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Thus, data source paging is more efficient than UI paging.
trans-unit.target: Datakilde Bla er derfor mer effektivt enn Brukergrensesnittet Bla.

trans-unit.source: Only the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> object supports data source paging without modification.
trans-unit.target: Bare den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>objektet støtter datakilde Bla uten endring.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: To enable the paging feature, set the AllowPaging property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil aktivere funksjonen Bla egenskapen AllowPaging til `true`.

trans-unit.source: You can determine the total number of items in the underlying data source by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan fastslå antall elementer i den underliggende datakilden ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageCount%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the currently displayed item, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå indeksen for elementet som vises i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: When paging is enabled, an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Når Bla er aktivert, vises automatisk en ekstra rad kalt personsøker raden i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The pager row contains the page navigation controls and can be displayed at the top, bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control.
trans-unit.target: Raden personsøker inneholder Sidenavigeringskontrollene vises, og kan vises i topp, bunn, eller både toppen og bunnen av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The pager row has two built-in pager display modes: numbered pages and next and previous page links (default).
trans-unit.target: Personsøker raden har to innebygde personsøker visningsmodus: nummererte sider og neste og forrige sidekoblinger (standard).

trans-unit.source: The numbered pages mode displays links for the individual pages, allowing the user to navigate to a specific page.
trans-unit.target: Nummererte sider modus viser koblinger enkeltsider, som tillater brukeren å navigere til en bestemt side.

trans-unit.source: The next and previous links mode displays controls that allow the user to navigate to the next or the previous page.
trans-unit.target: Neste og forrige koblinger modus viser kontrollene som tillater brukeren å navigere til neste eller forrige side.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control automatically hides the pager row when the data source contains fewer than two records.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen skjuler automatisk personsøker raden når datakilden inneholder færre enn to poster.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: You can control the settings of the pager row (such as the pager display mode, the number of page links to display at a time, and the pager control's text label) by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerSettings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kontrollere innstillingene for raden personsøker (for eksempel personsøker visningsmodus, antall siden koblinger skal vises på et tidspunkt og personsøker kontrollens tekstetiketten) ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerSettings%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerSettings%2A>

trans-unit.source: To control the appearance of the pager row (including its background color, font color, and position), use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å styre utseendet til raden personsøker (inkludert bakgrunnsfarge, skriftfarge og posisjon), kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control also allows you to define a custom template for the pager row.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen muligheten til å definere en egendefinert mal for raden personsøker.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: For more information on creating a custom pager row template, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvordan du oppretter en egendefinert personsøker rad-mal, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerTemplate%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when paging occurs.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen inneholder flere hendelser som du kan bruke til å utføre en egendefinert handling når Bla oppstår.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available events.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hendelser som er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: |Event|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanged>|Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: | Hendelsen | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanged>| Forekommer når en av knappene personsøker, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen behandler Bla-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different record in the control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanging>|Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen brukes vanligvis når du trenger å utføre en oppgave når brukeren navigerer til en annen post i kontrollen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanging>| Forekommer når en av knappene personsøker, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen behandler Bla-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanging>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.| The value of AllowPaging is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å avbryte operasjonen Bla. | Verdien for AllowPaging lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable the paging feature; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>aktivere funksjonen Bla. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the alternating data rows in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet som lar deg angi utseendet til vekslende datarader i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the AlternatingRowStyle property to control the appearance of alternating data rows in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk AlternatingRowStyle-egenskapen for å kontrollere utseendet loddrette datarader i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set, the data rows are displayed alternating between the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RowStyle%2A> settings and the AlternatingRowStyle settings.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er angitt, vises dataradene veksling mellom den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RowStyle%2A>Innstillinger og innstillinger for AlternatingRowStyle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `AlternatingRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `AlternatingRowStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `AlternatingRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `AlternatingRowStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of alternating data rows in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen loddrette datarader i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the built-in control to delete the current record is displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den innebygde kontrollen slette oppføringen til gjeldende vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is bound to an object that inherits from <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanDelete%2A> property returns `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic deleting functionality.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen er bundet til et objekt som arver fra <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanDelete%2A>returnerer `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen kan dra nytte av datakilden kontrollens funksjoner og gir automatisk sletting funksjonalitet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanDelete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> object to delete data, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the underlying <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> object must be set with a delete query statement.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>objektet til å slette data, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for den underliggende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>objekt må angis med en delete-setningen for spørring.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: When the AutoGenerateDeleteButton property is set to `true`, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> row field with a Delete button is automatically displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen AutoGenerateDeleteButton er satt til `true`, en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>vises automatisk radfelt med en Slett-knapp i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Delete button permanently removes that record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Klikk Slett permanent å fjerne denne oppføring fra datakilden.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property for the automatic deletion feature to work.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Må du også angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen for automatisk sletting-funksjoner skal fungere.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when a record is deleted.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen inneholder flere hendelser som du kan bruke til å utføre en egendefinert handling når en post blir slettet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available events.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hendelser som er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: |Event|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleted>|Occurs when the Delete button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control deletes the record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: | Hendelsen | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleted>| Forekommer når du Slett, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen sletter oppføringen fra datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleted>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>|Occurs when the Delete button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control deletes the record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å kontrollere resultatet av sletteoperasjonen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>| Forekommer når du Slett, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen sletter oppføringen fra datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the delete operation.| The value of AutoGenerateDeleteButton is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å avbryte sletteoperasjonen. | Verdien for AutoGenerateDeleteButton lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display the built-in control to delete the current record; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å vise innebygde kontrollen hvis du vil slette gjeldende post. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the built-in controls to edit the current record are displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om de innebygde kontrollene til å redigere oppføringen til gjeldende vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When a data source control that supports updating is bound to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic updating functionality.
trans-unit.target: Når en kilde-kontroll for data som støtter oppdatering er bundet til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen kan dra nytte av datakilden kontrollens funksjoner og gir automatisk oppdatering funksjonalitet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For a data source control to update data, its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property must be set with an update query statement.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For datakilde kontroller til å oppdatere data, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen må være angitt med en update-setningen for spørring.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the AutoGenerateEditButton property is set to `true`, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> row field with an Edit button is automatically displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen AutoGenerateEditButton er satt til `true`, en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>vises automatisk radfelt med en Rediger-knappen i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Edit button puts that <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Klikk Rediger sette som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: When in edit mode, each bound field in the control that is not read-only displays the appropriate input control, such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control, for the field's data type.
trans-unit.target: I redigeringsmodus, viser hvert bundne felt i kontrollen som ikke er skrivebeskyttet den aktuelle inndataene kontrollen, for eksempel en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>kontroll for feltets datatype.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: This allows the user to modify the field's value.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar brukeren å endre verdien i feltet.

trans-unit.source: When clicked, the Edit button is also replaced with an Update button and a Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: Når du klikker, erstattes Rediger også med en Oppdater-knappen og Avbryt-knappen.

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Update button updates the record in the data source with any value changes and returns the control to the mode specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du klikker oppdateringsknappen oppdateringer oppføringen i datakilden med verdiendringer og returnerer kontrollen til modusen som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Cancel button abandons any value changes and returns the control to the default mode.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du klikker Avbryt opphever økten verdiendringer og returnerer kontrollen til standardmodus.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To put a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control in edit mode programmatically, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Å sette en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollere i redigeringsmodus programmatisk ved å bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A> property is also set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control automatically ensures that the field or fields specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property are read-only.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>også settes til `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen automatisk sørger for at feltet eller feltene som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Unless you implement your own updating functionality, you must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property for the automatic updating feature to work.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Med mindre du implementerer din egen oppdatering funksjon, må du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen for funksjonen for automatisk oppdatering skal fungere.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can control the appearance of the data rows when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in edit mode by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EditRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kontrollere utseendet av dataene rader når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen er i redigeringsmodus ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EditRowStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EditRowStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when a record is updated.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen inneholder flere hendelser som du kan bruke til å utføre en egendefinert handling når en post blir oppdatert.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available events.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hendelser som er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: |Event|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdated>|Occurs when the Update button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control updates the record.
trans-unit.target: | Hendelsen | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdated>| Forekommer når Oppdater-knappen, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen oppdateringer oppføringen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdated>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating>|Occurs when the Update button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control updates the record.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å kontrollere resultatet av oppdateringen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating>| Forekommer når Oppdater-knappen, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen oppdateringer oppføringen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the update operation.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanged>|Occurs after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control changes modes.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>|Occurs before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control changes modes.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å avbryte oppdateringen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanged>| Forekommer når kontrollen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>endringer modi. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>| Forekommer før de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen endrer modi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the mode change.| The value of AutoGenerateEditButton is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen brukes ofte avbryte endringen modus. | Verdien for AutoGenerateEditButton lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display the built-in controls to edit the current record; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å vise de innebygde kontrollene for å redigere gjeldende post. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the built-in controls to insert a new record are displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om de innebygde kontrollene å sette inn en ny post vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When a data source control that supports inserting is bound to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic inserting functionality.
trans-unit.target: Når en kilde-kontroll for data som støtter innsetting er bundet til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen kan dra nytte av datakilden kontrollens funksjoner og gir automatisk innsetting funksjonalitet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For a data source control to insert data, its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property must be set with an insert query statement.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For datakilde Kontroller å sette inn data, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen må være angitt med en insert-setningen for spørring.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the AutoGenerateInsertButton property is set to `true`, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> row field with a New button is automatically displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen AutoGenerateInsertButton er satt til `true`, en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>radfelt med en ny knapp vises automatisk i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: Clicking the New button puts that <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: Klikk knappen Ny sette som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen i insert-modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: When in insert mode, each bound field in the control that is not read-only displays the appropriate input control, such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control, for the field's data type.
trans-unit.target: I insert-modus, viser hvert bundne felt i kontrollen ikke er skrivebeskyttet den aktuelle inndataene kontrollen for eksempel en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>kontroll for feltets datatype.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: This allows the user to enter the field's value for the new record.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at brukeren angir feltverdien for den nye posten.

trans-unit.source: When clicked, the New button is also replaced with an Insert button and a Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: Når du klikker, erstattes ny også med en Insert-knappen og Avbryt-knappen.

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Insert button inserts the new record in the data source and returns the control to the mode specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Å klikke Sett inn setter inn ny post i datakilden, og returnerer kontrollen til modusen som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Cancel button abandons the insert operation and returns the control to the default mode.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du klikker Avbryt, opphever økten insert-operasjonen, og returnerer kontrollen til standardmodus.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To put a row in insert mode programmatically, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For å sette en rad i insert-modus programmatisk, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can control the appearance of a record that is in insert mode by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InsertRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kontrollere utseendet til en post som er i insert-modus ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InsertRowStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InsertRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when a new record is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen inneholder flere hendelser som du kan bruke til å utføre en egendefinert handling når en ny post settes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available events.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hendelser som er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: |Event|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserted>|Occurs when the Insert button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control inserts the record.
trans-unit.target: | Hendelsen | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserted>| Forekommer når Insert-knappen, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen setter inn oppføringen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserted>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to check the results of the insert operation.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting>|Occurs when the Insert button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control inserts the record.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å kontrollere resultatene for innsetting. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting>| Forekommer når Insert-knappen, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen setter inn oppføringen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the insert operation.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanged>|Occurs after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control changes modes.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>|Occurs before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control changes modes.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å avbryte innsettingen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanged>| Forekommer når kontrollen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>endringer modi. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>| Forekommer før de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen endrer modi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the mode change.| The value of AutoGenerateInsertButton is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen brukes ofte avbryte endringen modus. | Verdien for AutoGenerateInsertButton lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display the built-in controls to insert a new record; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å vise de innebygde kontrollene for å sette inn en ny post. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether row fields for each field in the data source are automatically generated and displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om radfelt for hvert felt i datakilden genereres automatisk og vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Each data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is represented by a row field.
trans-unit.target: Hver dataraden i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen representeres av et felt i raden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: When the AutoGenerateRows property is set to `true`, an automatically generated bound row field is created for each field in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen AutoGenerateRows er satt til `true`, opprettes et radfelt for automatisk genererte bundne for hvert felt i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Each field is then displayed in a row as text, in the order in which each field appears in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Hvert felt er vil vises i en rad som tekst i rekkefølgen som vises hvert felt i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Automatically generated bound row fields are not added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Automatisk genererte bundne radfelt er ikke lagt til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>

trans-unit.source: Automatically generating the rows provides a quick and easy way to display every field in the record.
trans-unit.target: Automatisk generering av radene gir en rask og enkel måte å vise alle feltene i oppføringen.

trans-unit.source: However, to make use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control's advanced capabilities you must explicitly declare the row fields to include in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid foreta bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen for avanserte funksjoner du må eksplisitt deklarere radfeltene som skal inkluderes i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Explicitly declared row fields can be used in combination with automatically generated row fields.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Eksplisitt deklarert radfelt kan brukes sammen med automatisk genererte radfelt.

trans-unit.source: When both are used, explicitly declared row fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated row fields.
trans-unit.target: Når både, eksplisitt deklarerte radfelt gjengis først etterfulgt av automatisk genererte radfelt.

trans-unit.source: The value of AutoGenerateRows is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for AutoGenerateRows lagres i visningsstatusen.
