trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display automatically generated bound row fields for each field in the data source; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>skal vises automatisk genererte bundne radfelt for hvert felt i datakilden. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image to display in the background of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir URL-adressen til et bilde som skal vises i bakgrunn for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the BackImageUrl property to specify the URL to an image to display in the background of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk BackImageUrl-egenskapen til å angi URL-adressen til et bilde som skal vises i bakgrunn for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the specified image is smaller than the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the image is tiled to fill in the background.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis det angitte bildet er mindre enn den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>side ved side kontroll, bildet slik at det fyller i bakgrunnen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: If the image is larger than the control, the image is cropped.
trans-unit.target: Hvis bildet er større enn kontrollen, beskjæres bildet.

trans-unit.source: The URL to an image to display in the background of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen til et bilde som skal vises i bakgrunn for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object that represents the bottom pager row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> objektet som representerer den nederste personsøker raden i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When paging is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Når Bla er aktivert (ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>egenskapen `true`), vises automatisk en ekstra rad kalt personsøker raden i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to other records, and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control.
trans-unit.target: Raden personsøker inneholder kontroller som tillater brukeren å navigere til andre oppføringer, og kan vises på toppen, nederst eller både toppen og bunnen av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the BottomPagerRow property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object that represents the bottom pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk BottomPagerRow-egenskapen for å programmatisk tilgang av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>objektet som representerer den nederste personsøker raden i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The BottomPagerRow property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control creates the bottom pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I BottomPagerRow-egenskapen er tilgjengelig etter at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen oppretter nederste personsøker rad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the bottom pager row, for example when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis når du skal endre programmatisk nederste personsøker rad, for eksempel når du legger til egendefinert innhold.

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the BottomPagerRow property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control will overwrite any changes.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i egenskapen BottomPagerRow må utføres etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen er gjengitte; motsatt fall, av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll, overskrives alle endringer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> that represents the bottom pager row in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> som representerer den nederste personsøker raden i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to render in an HTML caption element in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som skal gjengis i et HTML teksten-element i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er angitt for å gjøre kontrollen mer tilgjengelig for brukere av hjelpefunksjoner enheter.

trans-unit.source: Use the Caption property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen tittel til å angi teksten som skal gjengis i et HTML teksten-element i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the table that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: Teksten du angir gir hjelpefunksjoner enheter med en beskrivelse av tabellen som kan brukes til å gjøre kontrollen mer tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: Additional accessibility support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is provided by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CaptionAlign%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ytterligere tilgjengelighet støtte for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CaptionAlign%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CaptionAlign%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CaptionAlign%2A> property to specify the alignment of the HTML caption element in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CaptionAlign%2A>til å angi justering av elementet HTML teksten i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CaptionAlign%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of Caption is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for teksten lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the text to render in an HTML caption element in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer teksten som skal gjengis i et HTML teksten-element i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir vannrett eller loddrett posisjonen for elementet HTML teksten i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er angitt for å gjøre kontrollen mer tilgjengelig for brukere av hjelpefunksjoner enheter.

trans-unit.source: Use the CaptionAlign property to specify the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk CaptionAlign-egenskapen til å angi vannrett eller loddrett posisjonen for elementet HTML teksten i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er angitt for å gjøre kontrollen mer tilgjengelig for brukere av hjelpefunksjoner enheter.

trans-unit.source: This property is set using one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er angitt for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>nummereringsverdier.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible values.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser mulige verdier.

trans-unit.source: |Value|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`TableCaptionAlign.Bottom`|The caption element is aligned with the bottom of the table.| |`TableCaptionAlign.Left`|The caption element is aligned with the left side of the table.| |`TableCaptionAlign.NotSet`|The caption element's alignment is not set.| |`TableCaptionAlign.Right`|The caption element is aligned with the right side of the table.| |`TableCaptionAlign.Top`|The caption element is aligned with the top of the table.| Additional accessibility support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is provided by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Verdien | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | `TableCaptionAlign.Bottom`| Elementet teksten er i samsvar med nederst i tabellen. | | `TableCaptionAlign.Left`| Elementet teksten er i samsvar med til venstre i tabellen. | | `TableCaptionAlign.NotSet`| Justering for elementet teksten er ikke angitt. | | `TableCaptionAlign.Right`| Elementet teksten er i samsvar med høyre side av tabellen. | | `TableCaptionAlign.Top`| Elementet teksten er i samsvar med øverst i tabellen. | Ytterligere tilgjengelighet støtte for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A> property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A>til å angi teksten som skal gjengis i et HTML teksten-element i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of CaptionAlign is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for CaptionAlign lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_TableCaptionAlign.NotSet" name="TableCaptionAlign.NotSet" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_TableCaptionAlign.NotSet" name="TableCaptionAlign.NotSet" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir avstanden mellom innholdet i en celle, og den cellen kantlinje.

trans-unit.source: Use the CellPadding property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen CellPadding for å kontrollere avstanden mellom innholdet i en celle, og den cellen kantlinje.

trans-unit.source: The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Hvor utfylling angitt legges til alle sidene i cellen.

trans-unit.source: All cells in the same column of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control have the same width.
trans-unit.target: Alle celler i den samme kolonnen i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen ha samme bredde.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The padding amount is applied to the widest cell and all other cells in the column are adjusted to that cell width.
trans-unit.target: Hvor utfylling brukes på den største cellen og alle celler i kolonnen justeres til denne cellebredde.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, all cells in the same row have the same height.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte har alle celler i den samme raden samme høyde.

trans-unit.source: The padding amount is applied to the tallest cell in the row and all other cells in the row are adjusted to that cell height.
trans-unit.target: Hvor utfylling brukes på den høyeste cellen i raden og alle celler i raden er justert etter at cellehøyden.

trans-unit.source: Individual cell sizes cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: Enkelte celler størrelser kan ikke angis.

trans-unit.source: To adjust the spacing between cells, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellSpacing%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil justere avstanden mellom celler, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellSpacing%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellSpacing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The amount of space, in pixels, between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: Hvor mye diskplass, i piksler mellom innholdet i en celle, og den cellen kantlinje.

trans-unit.source: The default value is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er -1, som indikerer at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between cells.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir avstanden mellom celler.

trans-unit.source: Use the CellSpacing property to control the spacing between adjacent cells in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk CellSpacing-egenskapen for å kontrollere avstanden mellom tilstøtende celler i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally.
trans-unit.target: Denne avstand brukes både loddrett og vannrett.

trans-unit.source: The cell spacing is uniform for the entire control.
trans-unit.target: Avstanden celle er uniform for hele kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Individual cell spacing between rows or columns cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: Enkelte celler avstanden mellom rader eller kolonner kan ikke angis.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you set this property to a value greater than 0, and then set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.GridLines%2A> property to a value that displays the cell borders, a gap is displayed between the borders of adjacent cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du setter denne egenskapen til en verdi større enn 0, og angi deretter det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.GridLines%2A>egenskapen til en verdi som viser cellekantlinjer, et hull vises mellom kantlinjer sammenhengende celleområde.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.GridLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this situation, the CellSpacing property controls the size of the gap.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet styrer egenskapen CellSpacing størrelsen på avstanden.

trans-unit.source: To adjust the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellPadding%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil justere avstanden mellom innholdet i en celle, og den cellen kantlinje, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellPadding%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellPadding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The amount of space, in pixels, between cells.
trans-unit.target: Hvor mye diskplass, i piksler mellom celler.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0.

trans-unit.source: Switches the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control to the specified mode.
trans-unit.target: Bytter den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen angitt modus.

trans-unit.source: Use the ChangeMode method to programmatically switch the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control between edit, insert, and read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: Bruk metoden ChangeMode programmatisk bytte av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen mellom Rediger, insert og skrivebeskyttet modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This method also updates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A> property with the specified mode.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden oppdaterer også den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A>egenskap med angitt modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different mode values.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser verdiene annen modus.

trans-unit.source: |Mode|Description| |----------|-----------------| |`DetailsViewMode.Edit`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.| |`DetailsViewMode.Insert`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.| |`DetailsView.ReadOnly`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.|
trans-unit.target: | Modus | Beskrivelse | |----------|-----------------| | `DetailsViewMode.Edit`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>Kontrollen er i redigeringsmodus, som tillater brukeren å oppdatere verdiene i en oppføring. | | `DetailsViewMode.Insert`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>Kontrollen er i insert-modus, som tillater brukeren å legge til en ny post i datakilden. | | `DetailsView.ReadOnly`| Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen er i skrivebeskyttet modus som normal visningsmodus. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of a command row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet som lar deg angi utseendet til en kommando rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the CommandRowStyle property to control the appearance of a command row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk CommandRowStyle-egenskapen for å styre utseendet på en kommando rad i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A command row contains the command buttons to perform operations such as editing, deleting, and inserting.
trans-unit.target: En kommando rad inneholder kommandoknappene for å utføre operasjoner som redigering, sletting og innsetting.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `CommandRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `CommandRowStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CommandRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `CommandRowStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of a command row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen på en kommando rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField"></xref> object that represents an automatically generated row field using the specified field properties.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField"> </xref> objektet som representerer en automatisk generert radfelt ved hjelp av de angitte egenskapene.

trans-unit.source: The CreateAutoGeneratedRow method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create an automatically generated row field using the specified field properties.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateAutoGeneratedRow er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen til å opprette en automatisk generert radfelt ved hjelp av de angitte egenskapene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedFieldProperties"></xref> that contains the properties for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedFieldProperties"> </xref> som inneholder egenskapene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An that contains the field properties specified by the fieldProperties parameter.
trans-unit.target: En som inneholder feltegenskapene er angitt av den fieldProperties parameteren.

trans-unit.source: Creates a set of automatically generated row fields for the specified data item.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et sett med automatisk genererte radfelt for det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A> property is set to `true`, the CreateAutoGeneratedRows method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create a set of automatically generated row fields for the current data item.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>er satt til `true`, metoden CreateAutoGeneratedRows kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen for å opprette et sett med automatisk generert radfelt for gjeldende dataelement.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data item for which to create the automatically generated row fields.
trans-unit.target: Dataelementet som skal opprettes automatisk genererte radfelt.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the automatically generated row fields for the specified data item.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>som inneholder de automatisk genererte radfeltene for det angitte elementet.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control does not have any properties or attributes from which to generate fields.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen ikke har noen egenskaper eller attributter å generere felt fra.

trans-unit.source: Creates the control hierarchy used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter kontrollen hierarkiet brukes til å gjengi den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The CreateChildControls method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create the control hierarchy for the control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden av CreateChildControls er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen til å opprette kontrollhierarki for kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> that represents the data source for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>som representerer datakilden for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that this method is being called during data binding; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å angi at denne metoden kalles under databinding; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Antall elementer i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Creates a default table style object for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et standard stil tabellobjekt for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlStyle method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create its default table style object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateControlStyle er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen til å opprette den standard stil tabellobjekt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: In addition to the default style setting of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle> object, this method also sets the properties in the following table.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg til stilen standardinnstillingen en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle>objektet, denne metoden angir også egenskapene i følgende tabell.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle.GridLines%2A>|`GridLines.Both`| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle.CellSpacing%2A>|0|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle.GridLines%2A>| `GridLines.Both`| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle.CellSpacing%2A>|0|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle.CellSpacing%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle.GridLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains the default table style for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som inneholder tabellen standardstilen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Creates the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object that gets passed to the Select command.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> objekt som blir sendt til Select-kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: The CreateDataSourceSelectArguments method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object that gets passed to the Select command.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateDataSourceSelectArguments er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen til å opprette den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>objekt som blir sendt til Select-kommandoen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> that gets passed to the Select command
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> som blir sendt til kommandoen Select

trans-unit.source: Creates the complete set of automatically generated and user-defined row fields used to generate the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en fullstendig oversikt over automatisk genererte og brukerdefinerte radfelt som brukes til å generere kontrollen hierarkiet.

trans-unit.source: The CreateFieldSet method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create the complete set of row fields for the control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateFieldSet er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen til å opprette fullstendig oversikt over radfelt for kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A> property is set to `true`, automatically generated row fields are appended to the user-defined row fields contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>er satt til `true`, automatisk genererte radfelt legges til radfeltene brukerdefinerte i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create the automatically generated row fields based on the data item, pass in `true` for the `useDataSource` parameter; otherwise, the automatically generated row fields are created based on properties of the existing row fields in the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette automatisk genererte radfelt basert på dataelementet, kan du sende i `true` for den `useDataSource` parameteren; ellers radfeltene automatisk genererte opprettes basert på egenskapene til eksisterende radfeltene i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The data item for which to create the row fields.
trans-unit.target: Dataelementet som skal opprettes radfelt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use the data item to create the automatically generated row fields; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>bruke dataelementet til å opprette automatisk genererte radfelt. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains both the automatically generated and the user-defined row fields for the specified data item.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>som inneholder både automatisk genererte og feltene brukerdefinerte raden for det angitte dataelementet.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object using the specified item index, row type, and row state.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> objekt med det angitte elementet indeks, radtypen og rad tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The CreateRow method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateRow er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen til å opprette en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the data item to display.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for dataelementet skal vises.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> with the specified item index, row type, and row state.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> med det angitte elementet indeks, radtypen og rad tilstand.

trans-unit.source: Creates the containing table for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter innholdstabellen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The CreateTable method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create a table that acts as the container for the control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateTable er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen for å opprette en tabell som fungerer som beholder for kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"></xref> that represents the containing table for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"> </xref> som representerer innholdstabellen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current data-entry mode of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende dataregistrering modus for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the CurrentMode property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in edit, insert, or read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: Bruk CurrentMode-egenskapen for å finne ut om den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen er i Rediger, innsetting eller skrivebeskyttet modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different mode values.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser verdiene annen modus.

trans-unit.source: |Mode|Description| |----------|-----------------| |`DetailsViewMode.Edit`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.| |`DetailsViewMode.Insert`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.| |`DetailsViewMode.ReadOnly`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.| This value is normally set automatically by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control by when the New, Update, Insert, Delete, or Cancel command button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: | Modus | Beskrivelse | |----------|-----------------| | `DetailsViewMode.Edit`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>Kontrollen er i redigeringsmodus, som tillater brukeren å oppdatere verdiene i en oppføring. | | `DetailsViewMode.Insert`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>Kontrollen er i insert-modus, som tillater brukeren å legge til en ny post i datakilden. | | `DetailsViewMode.ReadOnly`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>Kontrollen er i skrivebeskyttet modus som normal visningsmodus. | Denne verdien settes vanligvis automatisk ved den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll av når den ny, oppdatering, innsetting, slette eller Avbryt kommandoen ble brukt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically change the mode by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også programmatisk endre modus ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control changes modes, the events in the following table are raised.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen endrer modi, aktiveres hendelser i følgende tabell.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs a routine when the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg opprette en egendefinert hendelsesbehandling utfører en rutine når hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: |Event|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanged>|Occurs when a command button that changes the mode of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is clicked, but after the mode changes.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>|Occurs when a command button that changes the mode of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is clicked, but before the mode changes.|
trans-unit.target: | Hendelsen | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanged>| Forekommer når en kommandoknappen som endrer modus kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, men etter modus endringene. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>| Forekommer når en kommandoknappen som endrer modusen til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen klikkes, men før endringene modus. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind*> method of the base class.
trans-unit.target: Kaller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind*>-metoden til base klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind*>

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls should override <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PerformDataBinding%2A> instead of DataBind.
trans-unit.target: Databundet kontroller må overstyre <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PerformDataBinding%2A>i stedet for å Databinde.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PerformDataBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data item bound to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter dataelementet bundet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataItem property to access the data item bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen DataItem tilgang til dataelementet er bundet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The data item is often used to access the field values of the current record directly.
trans-unit.target: Dataelementet brukes ofte tilgang feltverdiene i oppføringen til gjeldende direkte.

trans-unit.source: The type of the <xref:System.Object> returned by this property varies depending on the data source.
trans-unit.target: Typen for den <xref:System.Object>returneres av denne egenskapen varierer avhengig av datakilden.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: For example, when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control is bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, a <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> object is returned.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel, når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>kontrollen er bundet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll, en <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Data.DataRowView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is available only after data binding has occurred.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne egenskapen er bare tilgjengelig når databinding oppstod.

trans-unit.source: Before data binding occurs, this property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Før data bindingen skjer denne egenskapen returnerer `null`.

trans-unit.source: This property is also not applicable when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in insert mode and returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er heller ikke gjelder når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen i insert-modus, og returnerer `null`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the data item bound to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer dataelementet bundet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter antallet elementer i den underliggende datakilden.

trans-unit.source: When the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`), use the DataItemCount property to determine the total number of records in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Når funksjonen Bla er aktivert (ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>egenskapen `true`), bruker du DataItemCount-egenskapen til å avgjøre Totalt antall poster i den underliggende datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control displays only one record at a time, this value also corresponds to the total number of pages required to display every record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Fordi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen viser bare én post om gangen, denne verdien tilsvarer det totale antallet sider som kreves for å vise alle poster i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the current record from the underlying data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil finne indeksen for oppføringen til gjeldende fra den underliggende datakilden, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Antall elementer i den underliggende datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the item being displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control from the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen for elementet som vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen fra den underliggende datakilden.

trans-unit.source: When the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`), use the DataItemIndex property to determine the index of the currently displayed record.
trans-unit.target: Når funksjonen Bla er aktivert (ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>egenskapen `true`), bruke egenskapen DataItemIndex til å fastsette indeksen for posten som for øyeblikket vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to programmatically change the displayed record.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke denne egenskapen til å endre programmatisk posten som vises.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the paging feature is enabled, you can also use this property to determine the page number of the record displayed; however, be aware that this property is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når Bla-funksjonen er aktivert, kan du også bruke denne egenskapen siden antall oppføringen vises; imidlertid Vær oppmerksom på at denne egenskapen nullbasert.

trans-unit.source: To determine the total number of items in the data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å avgjøre Totalt antall elementer i datakilden, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemCount%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the data item being displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control from the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for dataelement som vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen fra den underliggende datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> object that represents the primary key of the displayed record.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"> </xref> objektet som representerer primærnøkkelen for posten som vises.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control automatically creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object that represents the key field or fields for the current record.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen er angitt, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen oppretter automatisk et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objektet som representerer felt eller felt for den gjeldende posten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the DataKey property to get this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DataKey-egenskapen for å få tilgang til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to obtain the keys and their corresponding values for the fields specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis til å hente nøklene og deres tilsvarende verdier for feltene som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As a shortcut, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.SelectedValue%2A> property to determine the value of the first key field listed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som en snarvei du kan også bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.SelectedValue%2A>til å fastslå verdien for det første nøkkelfeltet som er oppført i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.SelectedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> that represents the primary key of the displayed record.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"> </xref> som representerer primærnøkkelen for posten som vises.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array that contains the names of the key fields for the data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en matrise som inneholder navnene på feltene i for datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataKeyNames property to specify a comma-separated list of field names that represent the primary key of the data source.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen DataKeyNames til å angi en kommadelt liste over feltnavnene som representerer primærnøkkelen for datakilden.

trans-unit.source: When the DataKeyNames property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control automatically creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object that represents the key field or fields for the current record and stores it in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKey%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen DataKeyNames angis, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen oppretter automatisk et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objekt som representerer nøkkelfelt eller felt i gjeldende post og lagrer den i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKey%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKey%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property is also set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control automatically ensures that the field or fields specified in the DataKeyNames property are read-only.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>også settes til `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen automatisk sikrer at feltet eller feltene som er angitt i egenskapen DataKeyNames er skrivebeskyttet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must set the DataKeyNames property for the automatic updating, deleting, and inserting features of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to work.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Må du angi DataKeyNames-egenskapen for automatisk oppdatering, sletting og innsetting for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen ikke virker.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property of a row field is set to `false`, the row is not displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control and the data for the row does not make a round trip to the client.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>egenskap for et radfelt er satt til `false`, raden vises ikke i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen og data for rad gjør ikke en tur til klienten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the data for a row that is not visible to make a round trip, add the field name to the DataKeyNames property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil at dataene for en rad som ikke er synlig for å gjøre en tur-retur, kan du legge til navnet på feltet i egenskapen DataKeyNames.

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the names of the key fields of the data source.
trans-unit.target: En matrise som inneholder navnene på feltene i for datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the default data-entry mode of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Får eller angir dataregistrering standardmodus for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the DefaultMode property to specify whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control returns to edit, insert, or read-only mode after an edit or insert operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DefaultMode-egenskapen til å angi om den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen returnerer Rediger, innsetting eller skrivebeskyttet modus når en Rediger eller insert-operasjonen utføres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control returns to read-only mode; however, you can keep the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control in edit or insert mode by setting this property to the appropriate value.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen returnerer til skrivebeskyttet modus; du kan imidlertid beholde den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll i Rediger eller Sett inn-modus ved å angi denne egenskapen til den passende verdien.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different mode values.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser verdiene annen modus.

trans-unit.source: |Mode|Description| |----------|-----------------| |`DetailsViewMode.Edit`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.| |`DetailsViewMode.Insert`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.| |`DetailsViewMode.ReadOnly`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.|
trans-unit.target: | Modus | Beskrivelse | |----------|-----------------| | `DetailsViewMode.Edit`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>Kontrollen er i redigeringsmodus, som tillater brukeren å oppdatere verdiene i en oppføring. | | `DetailsViewMode.Insert`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>Kontrollen er i insert-modus, som tillater brukeren å legge til en ny post i datakilden. | | `DetailsViewMode.ReadOnly`| Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen er i skrivebeskyttet modus som normal visningsmodus. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_DetailsViewMode.ReadOnly" name="DetailsViewMode.ReadOnly" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_DetailsViewMode.ReadOnly" name="DetailsViewMode.ReadOnly" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: Deletes the current record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Sletter gjeldende post fra datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The deletion does not occur if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in Insert mode.
trans-unit.target: Slettingen ikke oppstår hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen er i Insert-modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting> event is raised immediately before the item is deleted.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>hendelsen skjer umiddelbart før elementet ble slettet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true` to cancel the deletion.
trans-unit.target: Angi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen `true` å avbryte slettingen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method on the page that is called when the control performs a delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på metoden på siden som kalles når kontrollen utfører en sletting.

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: For en opplæring serie på ved hjelp av modellen binding med webskjema, kan du se [modellen bindingen og webskjema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).

trans-unit.source: The name of the method on the page that is called when the control performs a delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på metoden på siden som kalles når kontrollen utfører en sletting.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the data rows when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet som lar deg angi utseendet til dataene rader når en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen er i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: Use the EditRowStyle property to control the appearance of the data rows when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Bruk EditRowStyle-egenskapen til styrer utseendet av dataene rader når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen er i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the data rows when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen på dataene rader når en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen er i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the empty data row displayed when the data source bound to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet som lar deg angi utseendet til tom dataraden vises når datakilden er bundet til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen ikke inneholder noen poster.

trans-unit.source: Use the EmptyDataRowStyle property to control the appearance of the empty data row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk EmptyDataRowStyle-egenskapen for å kontrollere utseendet av tom dataraden i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: Tom dataraden vises når datakilden som er bundet til kontrollen ikke inneholder noen poster.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `EmptyDataRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `EmptyDataRowStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EmptyDataRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `EmptyDataRowStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that allows you to set the appearance of the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som lar deg angi utseendet av tom dataraden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user-defined content for the empty data row rendered when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en brukerdefinert innholdet for tom dataraden gjengis når en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde som ikke inneholder noen poster.

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: Tom dataraden vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollerer når datakilden som er bundet til kontrollen ikke inneholder noen poster.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: You can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the empty data row by using the EmptyDataTemplate property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan definere dine egne egendefinerte brukergrensesnittet (UI) for den tomme dataraden ved hjelp av egenskapen EmptyDataTemplate.

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for the null row, first place `<EmptyDataTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en egendefinert mal for raden null først plasseres `<EmptyDataTemplate>` koder mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<EmptyDataTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter liste opp innholdet i malen mellom innledende og avsluttende `<EmptyDataTemplate>` koder.

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the empty data row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å kontrollere stilen på tom dataraden i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the built-in UI for the empty data row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan eventuelt bruke innebygde Brukergrensesnittet for tom dataraden ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A>egenskapen i stedet for denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A> and EmptyDataTemplate properties are set, the EmptyDataTemplate property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis begge av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A>og EmptyDataTemplate egenskapene er angitt, prioriteres egenskapen EmptyDataTemplate.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the custom content for the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> som inneholder egendefinerte innholdet for den tomme dataraden.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in the empty data row rendered when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som skal vises i tom dataraden gjengis når en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde som ikke inneholder noen poster.

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: Tom dataraden vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollerer når datakilden som er bundet til kontrollen ikke inneholder noen poster.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Use the EmptyDataText property to specify the text to display in the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: Bruk EmptyDataText-egenskapen til å angi teksten som skal vises i tom dataraden.

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the empty data row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å kontrollere stilen på tom dataraden i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the empty data row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan alternativt definere dine egne egendefinerte brukergrensesnittet (UI) for den tomme dataraden ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>egenskapen i stedet for denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the EmptyDataText and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis begge EmptyDataText og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>egenskapene er angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>egenskapen prioriteres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of EmptyDataText is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for EmptyDataText lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som skal vises i tom dataraden.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data-model validation is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om datamodellen validering er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data model validation is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis datamodellen validering er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether client-side callback functions are used for paging operations in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om klientsiden tilbakeringing funksjoner brukes for sidevekslingsoperasjoner i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the EnablePagingCallbacks property to specify whether paging operations are performed using client-side callback functions.
trans-unit.target: Bruk EnablePagingCallbacks-egenskapen til å angi om sidevekslingsoperasjoner utføres ved hjelp av klientsiden tilbakeringing funksjoner.

trans-unit.source: When enabled, paging is performed using the callback feature, which prevents the need to post the page back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Når aktivert, utføres Bla ved hjelp av tilbakeringingsfunksjonen som hindrer at du må legge inn siden på serveren.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The client-side paging feature is only supported in Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 and later and Netscape 6.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Klientsiden Bla-funksjonen er bare støttet i Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 og senere og Netscape 6.0 og senere.

trans-unit.source: The value of EnablePagingCallbacks is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for EnablePagingCallbacks lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use client-side callback functions for paging operations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Bruk klientsiden tilbakeringing for sidevekslingsoperasjoner; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind*> method after verifying that the data listing control requires data binding and that a valid data source control is specified.
trans-unit.target: Kall den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind*>metoden etter å ha kontrollert at dataene opplisting kontrollen krever databinding og at det er angitt en ugyldig datakilde-kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind*>

trans-unit.source: The data binding does not occur if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in Insert mode.
trans-unit.target: Databindingen oppstår ikke hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen er i Insert-modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the values of each field displayed and stores them in the specified <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdier for hvert felt vises og lagrer dem i den angitte <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The ExtractRowValues method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to retrieve the values of each field.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ExtractRowValues er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen for å hente verdiene for hvert felt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The values can them be used for data source operations.
trans-unit.target: Verdiene kan dem brukes til datakilde operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the extracted values include read-only fields and key fields by using the `includeReadOnlyFields` and `includePrimaryKey` parameters, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi om de utpakkede verdiene inkluderer skrivebeskyttede felt og nøkkelfelt ved hjelp av den `includeReadOnlyFields` og `includePrimaryKey` parametere, henholdsvis.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> used to store the field values.
