trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> brukes til å lagre feltverdiene.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include read-only fields; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>inkludere skrivebeskyttet felt. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the primary key field or fields; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>inkludere felt eller feltene. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the header column in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet som lar deg angi utseendet til kolonnen topptekst i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the FieldHeaderStyle property to control the appearance of the field header column in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk FieldHeaderStyle-egenskapen for å kontrollere utseendet til kolonnen felt topptekst i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This is the column that contains the field names of the data values.
trans-unit.target: Dette er kolonnen som inneholder feltnavn av dataverdiene.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `FieldHeaderStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `FieldHeaderStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FieldHeaderStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `FieldHeaderStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the header column in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen for topp-kolonne i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> objects that represent the explicitly declared row fields in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> objekter som representerer radfeltene eksplisitt deklarerte i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When you explicitly declare the row fields for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, these row fields are stored in the Fields property (collection).
trans-unit.target: Når du eksplisitt deklarerer radfeltene for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, kontrollen disse feltene er lagret i egenskapen felt (samlingen) raden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The Fields collection also allows you to programmatically manage the collection of explicitly declared rows.
trans-unit.target: Feltsamlingen lar deg administrere programmatisk samlingen av eksplisitt deklarerte rader.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Explicitly declared row fields can be used in combination with automatically generated row fields.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Eksplisitt deklarert radfelt kan brukes sammen med automatisk genererte radfelt.

trans-unit.source: When both are used, explicitly declared row fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated row fields.
trans-unit.target: Når både, eksplisitt deklarerte radfelt gjengis først etterfulgt av automatisk genererte radfelt.

trans-unit.source: Automatically generated row fields are not added to the Fields collection.
trans-unit.target: Automatisk genererte rad felt ikke er lagt til i feltsamlingen.

trans-unit.source: Different row field types determine the behavior of the rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: Feltet for forskjellige radtyper bestemmer virkemåte rader i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the different row field types that can be used in the Fields collection.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser raden forskjellige typer som kan brukes i feltsamlingen.

trans-unit.source: |Row field type|Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>|Displays the value of a field in a data source as text.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>|Displays a command button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: | Radtypen feltet | Beskrivelse | |--------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>| Viser verdien for et felt i en datakilde som tekst. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>| Viser en kommandoknapp i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to display a row with a custom button control, such as an Add or a Remove button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>|Displays a check box in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg vise en rad med en egendefinert knappekontrollen, for eksempel en Legg til eller Fjern-knappen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>| Viser en avmerkingsboks i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>

trans-unit.source: This row field type is commonly used to display fields with a Boolean value.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>|Displays built-in command buttons to perform edit, insert, or delete operations in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkField>|Displays the value of a field in a data source as a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: Denne raden felttypen brukes vanligvis til å vise felt med en boolsk verdi. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>| Viser innebygd kommando knappene for å utføre Rediger og sette inn eller slette operasjoner i kontrollen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkField>| Viser verdien for et felt i en datakilde som en hyperkobling.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: This row field type allows you to bind a second field to the hyperlink's URL.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>|Displays an image in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>|Displays user-defined content for a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control according to a specified template.
trans-unit.target: Denne raden felttypen kan du binde et annet felt til hyperkoblingen URL-adresse. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>| Viser et bilde i kontrollen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>| Viser en brukerdefinert innholdet for en rad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen i henhold til en angitt mal.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: This row field type allows you to create a custom row field.| To explicitly declare the row fields for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Denne raden felttypen kan du opprette en egendefinert rad-felt. | Å eksplisitt angi radfeltene for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollere første settet av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Next, add opening and closing `<Fields>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Legg til neste åpner og lukker `<Fields>` koder mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Finally, list the row fields that you want to include between the opening and closing `<Fields>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Vis til slutt radfelt som du vil inkludere mellom innledende og avsluttende `<Fields>` koder.

trans-unit.source: The row fields are displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control in the order that the row fields appear in the Fields collection.
trans-unit.target: Feltene raden skal vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen i rekkefølgen som feltene raden finnes i feltsamlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Although you can programmatically add row fields to the Fields collection, it is easier to list the row fields declaratively in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control and then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property of each row field to show or hide the row field.
trans-unit.target: Selv om du kan legge til radfelt programmatisk i samlingen felt, er det enklere å vise radfeltene deklarativt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollere og deretter bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>for hver radfelt å vise eller skjule rad-felt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property of a row field is set to `false`, the row is not displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control and the data for the row does not make a round trip to the client.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>egenskap for et radfelt er satt til `false`, raden vises ikke i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen og data for rad gjør ikke en tur til klienten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the data for a row that is not visible to make a round trip, add the field name to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil at dataene for en rad som ikke er synlig for å gjøre en tur-retur, kan du legge til feltnavnet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection"></xref> that contains all explicitly declared row fields in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection"> </xref> som inneholder alle eksplisitt deklarerte radfelt i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object that represents the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> objektet som representerer bunntekst rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Bunntekstraden vises nederst i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollerer når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>-egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Use the FooterRow property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object that represents the footer row.
trans-unit.target: Bruk FooterRow-egenskapen for å programmatisk tilgang av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>objektet som representerer bunntekstraden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A> property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control creates the footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A>egenskapen er tilgjengelig etter at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen oppretter bunntekst rad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the footer row, for example when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis når du skal endre programmatisk bunntekstraden for eksempel når du legger til egendefinert innhold.

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the FooterRow property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control will overwrite any changes.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i egenskapen FooterRow må utføres etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen er gjengitte; motsatt fall, av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll, overskrives alle endringer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the footer row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å kontrollere stilen for bunntekstraden i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> that represents the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> som representerer bunntekst rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet som lar deg angi utseendet til bunntekstraden i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Bunntekstraden vises nederst i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollerer når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>-egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Use the FooterStyle property to control the appearance of the footer row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk FooterStyle-egenskapen for å kontrollere utseendet til bunntekstraden i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `FooterStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `FooterStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FooterStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `FooterStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen på bunnteksten rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user-defined content for the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en brukerdefinert innholdet for bunntekstraden i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> or FooterTemplate property is set.
trans-unit.target: Bunntekstraden vises nederst i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollerer når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>eller FooterTemplate-egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: You can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the footer row by using the FooterTemplate property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan definere dine egne egendefinerte brukergrensesnittet (UI) for bunntekstrad ved hjelp av egenskapen FooterTemplate.

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for the footer row, first place `<FooterTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en egendefinert mal for bunntekstraden først plasseres `<FooterTemplate>` koder mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<FooterTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter liste opp innholdet i malen mellom innledende og avsluttende `<FooterTemplate>` koder.

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the footer row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å kontrollere stilen for bunntekstraden i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can simply display text in the footer row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: Alternativt kan du ganske enkelt å vise tekst i bunntekstraden ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>egenskapen i stedet for denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> and FooterTemplate properties are set, the FooterTemplate property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis begge av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>og FooterTemplate egenskapene er angitt, prioriteres egenskapen FooterTemplate.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the custom content for the footer row.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> som inneholder egendefinerte innholdet for bunntekstraden.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in the footer row of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som skal vises i bunntekstraden for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the FooterText or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Bunntekstraden vises nederst i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollerer når FooterText eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>-egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Use the FooterText property to specify the text to display in the footer row.
trans-unit.target: Bruk FooterText-egenskapen til å angi teksten som skal vises i bunntekstraden.

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the footer row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å kontrollere stilen for bunntekstraden i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the footer row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: Alternativt kan du definere dine egne egendefinerte brukergrensesnittet (UI) for bunntekstraden ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>egenskapen i stedet for denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the FooterText and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis begge FooterText og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>egenskapene er angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>egenskapen prioriteres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of FooterText is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for FooterText lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the footer row.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som skal vises i bunntekstraden.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of a callback event that targets a control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer resultatet av en tilbakeringing hendelse som er rettet mot en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> interface and uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> to retrieve data and the GetCallbackResult method to return the retrieved data to the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollere implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler>grensesnittet og bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>til å hente data og GetCallbackResult-metoden til å returnere de hentede dataene til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The results of the callback.
trans-unit.target: Resultatene av tilbakeringing.

trans-unit.source: Returns the callback string created using the specified argument.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer tilbakeringing strengen opprettet ved hjelp av det angitte argumentet.

trans-unit.source: The control that initiated the callback.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen som startet tilbakeringing.

trans-unit.source: The callback code.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakekall-koden.

trans-unit.source: The complete callback string to be sent to the client.
trans-unit.target: Fullført tilbakeringing strengen som skal sendes til klienten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the gridline style for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir rutenettstilen for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the GridLines property to specify the gridline style for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk rutenettlinjene-egenskapen til å angi rutenett-stil for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available styles.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser tilgjengelige stiler.

trans-unit.source: |Style|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`GridLines.None`|No gridlines are displayed.| |`GridLines.Horizontal`|Displays the horizontal gridlines only.| |`GridLines.Vertical`|Displays the vertical gridlines only.| |`GridLines.Both`|Displays both the horizontal and vertical gridlines.|
trans-unit.target: | Stilen | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | `GridLines.None`| Ingen rutenettlinjene skal vises. | | `GridLines.Horizontal`| Viser de vannrette rutenettlinjene. | | `GridLines.Vertical`| Viser de loddrette rutenettlinjene. | | `GridLines.Both`| Viser både vannrette og loddrette rutenettlinjene. |

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_GridLines.Both" name="GridLines.Both" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_GridLines.Both" name="GridLines.Both" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object that represents the header row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> objektet som representerer overskriftsrad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The header row is displayed at the top of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Overskriftsraden vises øverst i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollerer når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderText%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A>-egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Use the HeaderRow property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object that represents the header row.
trans-unit.target: Bruk HeaderRow-egenskapen for å programmatisk tilgang av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>objektet som representerer overskriftsraden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderRow%2A> property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control creates the header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderRow%2A>egenskapen er tilgjengelig etter at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen oppretter overskriftsrad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the header row, for example when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis når du skal endre programmatisk overskriftsraden, for eksempel når du legger til egendefinert innhold.

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the HeaderRow property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control will overwrite any changes.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i egenskapen HeaderRow må utføres etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen er gjengitte; motsatt fall, av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll, overskrives alle endringer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> that represents the header row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> som representerer overskriftsrad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the header row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet som lar deg angi utseendet til overskriftsrad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the HeaderStyle property to control the appearance of the header row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk HeaderStyle-egenskapen for å kontrollere utseendet til overskriftsrad i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `HeaderStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `HeaderStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `HeaderStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `HeaderStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis begge av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderText%2A>og HeaderTemplate egenskapene er angitt, prioriteres egenskapen HeaderTemplate.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the custom content for the header row.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> som inneholder egendefinerte innholdet for overskriftsraden.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in the header row of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som skal vises i overskriftsraden i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The header row is displayed at the top of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the HeaderText or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Overskriftsraden vises øverst i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollerer når HeaderText eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A>-egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Use the HeaderText property to specify the text to display in the header row.
trans-unit.target: Bruk HeaderText-egenskapen til å angi teksten som skal vises i overskriftsraden.

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the header row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å kontrollere stilen for overskriftsraden den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the header row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan alternativt definere dine egne egendefinerte brukergrensesnittet (UI) for overskriftsraden ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A>egenskapen i stedet for denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the HeaderText and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis begge HeaderText og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A>egenskapene er angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A>egenskapen prioriteres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of HeaderText is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for HeaderText lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the header row.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som skal vises i overskriftsraden.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control on the page.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir vannrett justering av en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontroll på siden.

trans-unit.source: Use the HorizontalAlign property to specify the horizontal alignment of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control within the page.
trans-unit.target: Bruk HorizontalAlign-egenskapen til å angi vannrett justering av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen på siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different horizontal alignment styles.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser annen vannrett justering stiler.

trans-unit.source: |HorizontalAlign value|Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| |`HorizontalAlign.NotSet`|The horizontal alignment of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control has not been set.| |`HorizontalAlign.Left`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is left-aligned on the page.| |`HorizontalAlign.Center`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is centered on the page.| |`HorizontalAlign.Right`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is right-aligned on the page.| |`HorizontalAlign.Justify`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is aligned with both the left and right margins of the page.|
trans-unit.target: | Verdien for HorizontalAlign | Beskrivelse | |---------------------------|-----------------| | `HorizontalAlign.NotSet`| Vannrett justering av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen er ikke angitt. | | `HorizontalAlign.Left`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>Kontrollen er venstrejustert på siden. | | `HorizontalAlign.Center`| Kontrollen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>midt på siden. | | `HorizontalAlign.Right`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>Kontrollen er høyrejustert på siden. | | `HorizontalAlign.Justify`| Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen er justert med både venstre og høyre Marge av siden. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_HorizontalAlign.NotSet" name="HorizontalAlign.NotSet" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_HorizontalAlign.NotSet" name="HorizontalAlign.NotSet" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates the pager row for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter personsøker raden for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The InitializePager method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create the pager row.
trans-unit.target: Metoden InitializePager er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen til å opprette raden personsøker.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: It creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object that contains the navigation controls using the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource> object contained in the `pagedDataSource` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den oppretter en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>objekt som inneholder de Sidenavigeringskontrollene vises ved hjelp av egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource>objekt i den `pagedDataSource` parameteren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: The cell is then added to the row specified by the `row` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Cellen legges deretter til i raden angitt av den `row` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> that contains the pager row.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> som inneholder raden personsøker.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource"></xref> that contains the data for the current page.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource"> </xref> som inneholder data for gjeldende side.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer angitt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The InitializeRow method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to initialize the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden InitializeRow er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen ikke den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The row is initialized for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object contained in the `field` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Raden er initialisert den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>objekt i den `field` parameteren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> to initialize.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> ikke initialisert.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> that corresponds to the row.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> som tilsvarer raden.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Setter inn oppføringen til gjeldende i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in insert mode, use the InsertItem method to programmatically insert the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen er i insert-modus ved å bruke metoden InsertItem programmatisk sette inn oppføringen til gjeldende i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used when you need to insert the current record from outside of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, such as from a different control on the page.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes vanligvis når du trenger å sette inn oppføringen til gjeldende fra utenfor den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollere, for eksempel fra en annen kontroll på siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control must be in insert mode when this method is called; otherwise, an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen må være i insert-modus når denne metoden er kall; ellers, en <xref:System.Web.HttpException>unntak.</xref:System.Web.HttpException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: To specify whether page validation is performed before the insert operation, use the `causesValidation` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi om siden valideringen utføres før innsettingen, kan du bruke den `causesValidation` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method also raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting> events.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden også hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserted>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting>hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserted>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to perform page validation when the method is called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å utføre siden når metoden kalles; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method on the page that is called when the control performs an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på metoden på siden som kalles når kontrollen utfører en insert-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: For en opplæring serie på ved hjelp av modellen binding med webskjema, kan du se [modellen bindingen og webskjema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).

trans-unit.source: The name of the method on the page that is called when the control performs an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på metoden på siden som kalles når kontrollen utfører en insert-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the data rows in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet som lar deg angi utseendet til datarader i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollerer når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen er i insert-modus.

trans-unit.source: The data rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control are displayed using this style when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: Dataene rader i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen skal vises ved hjelp av denne stilen når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen er i insert-modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Use the InsertRowStyle property to control the appearance of the data rows in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen InsertRowStyle for å kontrollere utseendet til datarader i insert-modus.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `InsertRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `InsertRowStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `InsertRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `InsertRowStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the data rows in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen for datarader i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollerer når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen er i insert-modus.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified data type can be bound to a field in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om angitt datatype kan være bundet til et felt i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The IsBindableType method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to determine whether the specified data type can be bound to a field in the control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden IsBindableType er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen for å finne ut om den angitte datatypen kan være bundet til et felt i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control supports the following data types: All primitive data types, such as <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.Byte>, and <xref:System.Int32> <xref:System.DateTime> <xref:System.Decimal> <xref:System.Guid> <xref:System.String>
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen støtter følgende datatyper: alle primitive datatypene, slik som <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.Byte>, og <xref:System.Int32><xref:System.DateTime><xref:System.Decimal><xref:System.Guid><xref:System.String></xref:System.String> </xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the data type to check.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer datatypen til å kontrollere.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified data type can be bound to a field in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis angitt datatype kan være bundet til et felt i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollere; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a button within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en knapp i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen klikkes.

trans-unit.source: The ItemCommand event is raised when a button within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: ItemCommand denne hendelsen oppstår når en knapp i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelsesbehandling som utfører en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the command name and command argument of the button clicked.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen, slik at du kan finne kommandonavnet og kommando-argument for knappen klikket.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the current record, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil finne indeksen for gjeldende post, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a record is created in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en post blir opprettet i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The ItemCreated event is raised each time a record is created in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: ItemCreated denne hendelsen oppstår hver gang en oppføring er opprettet i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This can occur when the control is first rendered, or when the user navigates to another record.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan skje når kontrollen er gjengitt, eller når brukeren navigerer til en annen post.

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as adding custom content to a row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne hendelsen til å gi en hendelsesbehandling som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel legge til egendefinert innhold til en rad når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: You can access the header, footer, and pager rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderRow%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterRow%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.TopPagerRow%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.BottomPagerRow%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til topptekst, bunntekst og personsøker radene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderRow%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterRow%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.TopPagerRow%2A>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.BottomPagerRow%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.BottomPagerRow%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.TopPagerRow%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterRow%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderRow%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: To access one of the data rows, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Tilgang til en av dataradene, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a Delete button within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control is clicked, but after the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en Slett-knapp i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen klikkes, men etter sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The ItemDeleted event is raised when a Delete button within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is clicked, but after the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: ItemDeleted denne hendelsen oppstår når en Slett-knapp i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen klikkes, men etter sletteoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of the delete operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelsesbehandling som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel kontroll resultatene av sletteoperasjonen, når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeletedEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the number of rows affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeletedEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen, slik at du kan finne ut hvor mange berørt av rader og eventuelle unntak som kan ha forekommet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi om unntaket ble behandlet i behandlingsprogrammet ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a Delete button within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control is clicked, but before the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en Slett-knapp i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen klikkes, men før sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The ItemDeleting event is raised when a Delete button within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is clicked, but before the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: ItemDeleting denne hendelsen oppstår når en Slett-knapp i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen klikkes, men før sletteoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the delete operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelsesbehandling som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel avbryter sletteoperasjonen, når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the index of the record being deleted and to indicate that the delete operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen, som gjør det mulig å finne ut indeksen for oppføringen slettes og å angi at sletteoperasjonen bør avbrytes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the delete operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte sletteoperasjonen, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> collections, if necessary, before the values are passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også redigere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A>samlinger, eventuelt før verdiene er sendt til datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of the insert operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelsesbehandling som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel kontroll resultatene av insert-operasjonen når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the number of rows affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen, slik at du kan finne ut hvor mange berørt av rader og eventuelle unntak som kan ha forekommet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi om unntaket ble behandlet i behandlingsprogrammet ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To keep the control in insert mode after an insert operation, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil beholde kontrollen i insert-modus etter en insert-operasjonen, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A>

trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en Oppdater-knappen i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen klikkes, men før oppdateringen.

trans-unit.source: The ItemUpdating event is raised when an Update button within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is clicked, but before the update operation.
trans-unit.target: ItemUpdating denne hendelsen oppstår når en Oppdater-knappen i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen klikkes, men før oppdateringen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the update operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelsesbehandling som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel avbryte oppdateringen, når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the index of the record being updated and to indicate that the update operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen, som gjør det mulig å finne ut indeksen for oppføringen oppdateres og å angi at oppdateringen bør avbrytes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the update operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte oppdateringen, kan du angi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> collections, if necessary, before the values are passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også redigere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>samlinger, eventuelt før verdiene er sendt til datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: A common way to use these collections is to HTML-encode the values supplied by the user before they are stored in the data source.
trans-unit.target: En vanlig måte å bruke disse samlingene som HTML-kode verdiene som er oppgitt av brukeren før de er lagret i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: This helps to prevent script injection attacks.
trans-unit.target: Dette bidrar til å forhindre skriptet innsetting angrep.

trans-unit.source: Loads the state of the properties in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn tilstanden egenskapene i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontroll som må være fast, selv når den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState*>er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState*>

trans-unit.source: The LoadControlState method is used to load the state of the properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden LoadControlState brukes til å laste statusen til egenskapene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen som skal beholdes, selv når den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere når utvider den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer statusen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn tidligere lagret visningsstatusen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av .NET Framework-infrastruktur og skal ikke brukes direkte fra koden.

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollutviklere kan imidlertid overstyre denne metoden hvis du vil angi hvordan en egendefinert serverkontroll gjenoppretter visningstilstanden.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ASP.NET oversikt over tilstand](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The LoadViewState method is used to load the previously saved view state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden LoadViewState brukes til å laste inn tidligere lagret visningsstatusen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer statusen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode*> property is updated.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen prøver å endre mellom Rediger, insert og skrivebeskyttet modus, men etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode*>egenskapen er oppdatert.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode*>

trans-unit.source: The ModeChanged event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A> property is updated.
trans-unit.target: ModeChanged denne hendelsen oppstår når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen prøver å endre mellom Rediger, insert og skrivebeskyttet modus, men etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A>egenskapen er oppdatert.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as synchronizing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control with another control, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg angi hendelsesbehandling som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel synkronisering av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll med andre kontroller, når denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
