trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode*> property is updated.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen prøver å endre mellom Rediger, insert og read-only-modus, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode*>egenskapen er oppdatert.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode*>

trans-unit.source: The ModeChanging event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A> property is updated.
trans-unit.target: ModeChanging denne hendelsen oppstår når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen prøver å endre mellom Rediger, insert og read-only-modus, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A>egenskapen er oppdatert.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the mode change, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelsesbehandling som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel avbryter endringen modus når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the new mode, to determine whether the mode change was a result of the user canceling an edit operation, or to cancel the mode change.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen, slik at du kan finne den nye modusen å finne ut om endring i er et resultat av brukeren avbryter en redigeringsoperasjon eller forkaste endringen modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To determine the new mode, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil finne den nye modusen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the mode change was a result of the user canceling an edit operation, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå om endringen i er et resultat av brukeren avbryter en redigeringsoperasjonen den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the mode change by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan avbryte endringen modus ved å angi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the event for the Web server control is passed up the page's user interface (UI) server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om hendelsen for kontrollen for Web-server blir sendt sidens bruker brukergrensesnittet (UI) server kontrollen hierarkiet.

trans-unit.source: The OnBubbleEvent method implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to pass events from child controls to the page hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnBubbleEvent implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden til å sende hendelser fra underordnede kontroller siden hierarki.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnPageIndexChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnPageIndexChanged kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanging"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The OnPageIndexChanging method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanging> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnPageIndexChanging kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen opphøye den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanging>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: It is generally used by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> class.
trans-unit.target: Det brukes vanligvis av kontrollutviklere når utvider <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnPageIndexChanging method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnPageIndexChanging kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control is not bound to a data source control, the paging operation was not canceled, and an event handler is not registered for the event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen er ikke bundet til en kilde-kontroll for data, bla operasjonen ikke ble avbrutt og hendelsesbehandling er ikke registrert for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Sets the initialized state of the data-bound control before the control is loaded.
trans-unit.target: Angir initialisert kontrollens databundet før kontrollen lastes.

trans-unit.source: The OnPagePreLoad method is used to control when data binding occurs within the life cycle of the page.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnPagePreLoad brukes til kontroll når databinding forekommer innenfor livssyklusen for siden.

trans-unit.source: It does this by setting the internal initialized state of the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Det gjør du ved å angi intern initialisert kontrollens databundet.

trans-unit.source: Because the control's initialized state is set during the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreLoad> phase of the page's life cycle, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> event handler is called any time a data property of the control is changed after that phase, to signal that the control must re-bind to its data before rendering.
trans-unit.target: Fordi kontrollen er initialisert tilstand angis under den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreLoad>fasen av sidens levetid, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når som helst et data-egenskapen for kontrollen er endret etter at fase til signalisere at kontrollen på nytt må binde til data før gjengivelse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreLoad>

trans-unit.source: The OnPagePreLoad method is overridden by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> class to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true` in cases where the HTTP request is a postback and view state is enabled but the data-bound control has not yet been bound.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnPagePreLoad overstyres av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>klassen for å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A>egenskapen `true` i tilfeller der HTTP-forespørselen er en tilbakesending og visningsstatusen er aktivert, men kontrollen databundet ennå ikke er bundet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This scenario is common with controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>, where the visibility of the control is changed at run time.
trans-unit.target: Dette scenarioet som er felles med kontroller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>, der synligheten for kontrollen er endret på kjøretidspunktet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"> </xref> som hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This method notifies the server control to perform any necessary prerendering steps prior to saving view state and rendering content .It is generally used by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden varsler serverkontroll å utføre nødvendige prerendering trinn før lagring visningsstatus og gjengivelse innhold. Det brukes vanligvis av kontrollutviklere når utvider <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnPreRender kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of records in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall poster i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property is `null`, `0` is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>egenskapen `null`, `0` returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of records in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Antall oppføringer i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the displayed record.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir indeksen for posten som vises.

trans-unit.source: When the paging feature is enabled (when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A> property is set to `true`), use the PageIndex property to determine the index of the currently displayed record.
trans-unit.target: Når funksjonen Bla er aktivert (når det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>er satt til `true`), bruke egenskapen PageIndex til å bestemme indeksen for posten som for øyeblikket vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to programmatically change the displayed record.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke denne egenskapen til å endre programmatisk posten som vises.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the paging feature is enabled, you can also use this property to determine the page number of the record displayed; however, be aware that this property is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når Bla-funksjonen er aktivert, kan du også bruke denne egenskapen siden antall oppføringen vises; imidlertid Vær oppmerksom på at denne egenskapen nullbasert.

trans-unit.source: To determine the total number of items in the data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å avgjøre Totalt antall elementer i datakilden, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageCount%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the data item being displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control from the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for dataelement som vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen fra den underliggende datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The selected value is less than <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den valgte verdien er mindre enn <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex*> property changes after a paging operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex*>egenskapsendringer etter en Bla-operasjon.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control raises the PageIndexChanged event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen opphøyer PageIndexChanged-hendelse når en Personsøkerknapp (en knapp med den `CommandName` egenskapen satt til "Siden") i kontrollen klikkes, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen behandler Bla-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelsesbehandling som utfører en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This event is not raised when you programmatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne hendelsen oppstår ikke når du angir programmatisk den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Personsøker knappene vanligvis finnes i raden personsøker for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to synchronize a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control or to set the behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control after a paging operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å synkronisere en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>styre med en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen eller til å angi virkemåten for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen etter en Bla-operasjon.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex*> property changes before a paging operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex*>egenskapsendringer før en Bla-operasjon.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control raises the PageIndexChanging event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen opphøyer PageIndexChanging-hendelse når en Personsøkerknapp (en knapp med den `CommandName` egenskapen satt til "Siden") i kontrollen klikkes, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen behandler Bla-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the paging operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelsesbehandling som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel avbryte operasjonen Bla når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This event is not raised when you programmatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne hendelsen oppstår ikke når du angir programmatisk den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Personsøker knappene vanligvis finnes i raden personsøker for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the index of the page selected by the user and to indicate that the paging operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen, som gjør det mulig å finne ut indeksen på siden som er valgt av brukeren og å angi at operasjonen Bla bør avbrytes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the page selected by the user, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å finne ut indeksen på siden som er valgt av brukeren, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the paging operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte operasjonen Bla, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs>objekt `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings"></xref> object that allows you to set the properties of the pager buttons in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings"> </xref> objektet der du kan angi egenskaper for knappene personsøker i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the PagerSettings property to control the settings of the pager row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk PagerSettings-egenskapen for å kontrollere innstillingene for personsøker rad i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The pager row is displayed when the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`) and contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different records in the control.
trans-unit.target: Raden personsøker vises når Bla-funksjonen er aktivert (ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>egenskapen `true`) og inneholder kontroller som tillater brukeren å navigere til annen oppføringene i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings> object (for example, `PagerSetting-Mode`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings>objektet (for eksempel `PagerSetting-Mode`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PagerSetting.Mode`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `PagerSetting.Mode`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include the pager row's display mode and custom text or images for the navigation controls.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger inkluderer vanligvis raden personsøker visningsmodus og egendefinert tekst eller bilder for Sidenavigeringskontrollene vises.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings"></xref> that allows you to set the properties of the pager buttons in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings"> </xref> som lar deg angi egenskapene for knappene personsøker i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the pager row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet som lar deg angi utseendet til personsøker rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the PagerStyle property to control the appearance of the pager row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk PagerStyle-egenskapen for å kontrollere utseendet til personsøker rad i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The pager row is displayed when the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`) and contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different pages in the control.
trans-unit.target: Raden personsøker vises når Bla-funksjonen er aktivert (ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>egenskapen `true`) og inneholder kontroller som tillater brukeren å navigere til forskjellige sider i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `PagerStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `PagerStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PagerStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `PagerStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the pager row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen for personsøker rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom content for the pager row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir egendefinerte innholdet for personsøker rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A pager row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A> property to true).
trans-unit.target: En personsøker rad vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollerer når Bla-funksjonen er aktivert (ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>egenskapen til SANN).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The pager row contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different pages in the control.
trans-unit.target: Raden personsøker inneholder kontrollene som tillater brukeren å navigere til forskjellige sider i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the built-in pager row user interface (UI), you can define your own UI by using the PagerTemplate property.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for innebygde personsøker rad-brukergrensesnittet (UI), kan du definere din egen Brukergrensesnittet ved hjelp av egenskapen PagerTemplate.

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for the pager row, first place `<PagerTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en egendefinert mal for raden personsøker først plasseres `<PagerTemplate>` koder mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<PagerTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter liste opp innholdet i malen mellom innledende og avsluttende `<PagerTemplate>` koder.

trans-unit.source: To control the appearance of the pager row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Egendefinere radverdiene personsøker, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the custom content for the pager row.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> som inneholder det egendefinerte innholdet for personsøker rad.

trans-unit.source: The default value is null, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er null, noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Binds the specified data source to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Binding den angitte datakilden til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The PerformDataBinding method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to bind the specified data source to the control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden PerformDataBinding er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen skal bindes den angitte datakilden til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>som representerer datakilden.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Sets up the control hierarchy of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Angir kontrollen hierarkiet med den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The PrepareControlHierarchy method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to set up the control hierarchy in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control before the control is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Metoden PrepareControlHierarchy er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen for å angi kontrollen hierarkiet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollerer før kontrollen gjengis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Creates the arguments for the callback handler in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference*> method.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter argumentene for tilbakeringing behandlingsprogrammet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference*>

trans-unit.source: The RaiseCallbackEvent method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create the arguments for the callback handler in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RaiseCallbackEvent er helper metode som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen til å opprette argumentene for tilbakeringing behandlingsprogrammet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The argument to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Argumentet til hendelsesbehandlingen.

trans-unit.source: Raises the appropriate events for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer de aktuelle hendelsene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollerer når den legger inn på serveren.

trans-unit.source: The page calls the RaisePostBackEvent method when a postback event occurs that raises the appropriate events for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Siden kaller RaisePostBackEvent metoden når det oppstår en sende tilbake hendelse som starter de nødvendige hendelsene for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This call occurs in the page life cycle after loading and change notification are complete, but before prerendering occurs.
trans-unit.target: Kallet oppstår i livssyklusen siden etter innlasting og endre varsel er fullført, men før prerendering forekommer.

trans-unit.source: This method has been implemented to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object for the events that are raised.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er implementert for å opprette en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>objekt for hendelsene som aktiveres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere for å utvide den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The event argument from which to create a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> for the event or events that are raised.
trans-unit.target: Argumentet hendelsen å opprette en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref> hendelsen eller hendelser som aktiveres.

trans-unit.source: Displays the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control on the client using the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Viser den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen i klienten ved hjelp av den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The Render method is used to render the server control content to the client's browser using the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden gjengivelse brukes til å gjengi server kontrollinnholdet til klientleseren parametersettet med de angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that contains the output stream to render on the client.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som inneholder utdata dataflyten å gjengi på klienten.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> objects that represent the data rows in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> objekter som representerer datarader i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Rows property (collection) is used to store the data rows in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen rader (samlingen) brukes til å lagre dataradene i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control automatically populates the Rows collection by creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object for each record in the data source and then adding the object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen fyller automatisk samlingen rader ved å opprette en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>objekt for hver oppføring i datakilden, og deretter legge til objektet i samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to access a specific row in the control or to iterate though the entire collection of rows.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis til å få tilgang til en bestemt rad i kontrollen eller gå gjennom hele samlingen av rader.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Only data rows are stored in the Rows collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Bare datarader som er lagret i samlingen rader.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> objects that represent the header, footer, and pager rows are not included in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>objekter som representerer topptekst, bunntekst og personsøker radene inkluderes ikke i samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"></xref> that contains all the data rows in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"> </xref> som inneholder alle dataradene i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IAutoFieldGenerator"></xref> interface in order to automatically populate rows in the view.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et objekt som implementerer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.IAutoFieldGenerator"> </xref> grensesnittet for å fylle automatisk rader i visningen.

trans-unit.source: An object that implement the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IAutoFieldGenerator"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som implementerer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.IAutoFieldGenerator"> </xref> grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the data rows in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet som lar deg angi utseendet til datarader i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the RowStyle property to control the appearance of the data rows in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk RowStyle-egenskapen for å kontrollere utseendet til datarader i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> property is also set, the data rows are displayed alternating between the RowStyle settings and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> settings.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>egenskapen også er angitt, dataradene vises veksling mellom RowStyle innstillingene og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>innstillinger.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `RowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `RowStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `RowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `RowStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the data rows in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen for datarader i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Saves the state of the properties in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer tilstanden egenskapene i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontroll som må være fast, selv når den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to save the state of the properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å lagre tilstanden til egenskapene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen som skal beholdes, selv når den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere for å utvide den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Returns the server control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den serverkontroll gjeldende visningsstatus.

trans-unit.source: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen visningsstatusen som er knyttet til kontrollen metoden returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Saves the current view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer gjeldende visningsstatusen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The SaveViewState method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to save the state of the control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SaveViewState er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen ikke lagre tilstanden til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the saved state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som inneholder den lagrede tilstanden til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data key value of the current record in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter data nøkkelverdi gjeldende oppføring i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedValue property to determine the data key value for the current record.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen SelectedValue til å finne data nøkkelverdien for gjeldende post.

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the actual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey?displayProperty=fullName> object that represents the data key for the record, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKey%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Til å hente den faktiske <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey?displayProperty=fullName>objektet som representerer data-nøkkelen for post, bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKey%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKey%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is the default property that a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object binds to at run time.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er egenskapen default som en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>objektet binding til ved kjøretid.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlValuePropertyAttribute>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>, and [Using Parameters with Data Source Controls for Filtering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlValuePropertyAttribute>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>, og [ved hjelp av parametere med kilden kontroller for å filtrere](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlValuePropertyAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The data key value of the current record in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Dataene for verdien for gjeldende oppføring i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Sets the index of the currently displayed page in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Angir indeksen for siden som vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The index value to set.
trans-unit.target: Indeksverdien.

trans-unit.source: See the method <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.GetCallbackResult*>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.GetCallbackResult*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.GetCallbackResult*> -metoden

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> interface and uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> to retrieve data and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.GetCallbackResult%2A> method to return the retrieved data to the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollere implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler>grensesnittet og bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>til å hente data og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.GetCallbackResult%2A>metode for å returnere de hentede dataene til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.GetCallbackResult%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The results of the callback.
trans-unit.target: Resultatene av tilbakeringing.

trans-unit.source: Raises the callback event using the specified arguments.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer tilbakeringing hendelsen med de angitte argumentene.

trans-unit.source: The event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Argumentene hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemIndex*>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha en beskrivelse for dette medlemmet kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemIndex*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemIndex*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> instance is cast to the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>forekomsten endres til den <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemIndex*> value.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemIndex*>verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemIndex*>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DisplayIndex*>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha en beskrivelse for dette medlemmet kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DisplayIndex*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DisplayIndex*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> instance is cast to the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>forekomsten endres til den <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse for dette medlemmet under <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> instance is cast to the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>forekomsten endres til den <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents an optional event argument to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer et valgfritt hendelsen argument skal sendes til hendelsesbehandlingen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref> with the information required for <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetPostBackEventReference*> to construct a valid script that, when executed on the client, initiates a client postback.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"> </xref> med informasjonen som kreves for <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetPostBackEventReference*>ikke konstruere et gyldig skript at, når den kjøres på klienten, tilbake starter en klient.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetPostBackEventReference*>

trans-unit.source: buttonControl is .
trans-unit.target: buttonControlis .

trans-unit.source: buttonControl causes validation in the control and attempts to use the same control as a postback target.
trans-unit.target: buttonControlfår valideringen i den kontrollen, og forsøk på å bruke samme kontrollen som sende tilbake mål.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref> value for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"> </xref> verdi den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The TagKey property allows the output stream to write the appropriate HTML markup for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen TagKey tillater utdata dataflyten å skrive riktig HTML-koden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EnablePagingCallbacks*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, this property returns <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EnablePagingCallbacks*>er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, denne egenskapen returnerer <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EnablePagingCallbacks*>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it returns <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ellers returneres <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object that represents the top pager row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> objektet som representerer den øverste personsøker raden i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When paging is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Når Bla er aktivert (ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>egenskapen `true`), vises automatisk en ekstra rad kalt personsøker raden i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to other records, and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control.
trans-unit.target: Raden personsøker inneholder kontroller som tillater brukeren å navigere til andre oppføringer, og kan vises på toppen, nederst eller både toppen og bunnen av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the TopPagerRow property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object that represents the top pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk TopPagerRow-egenskapen for å programmatisk tilgang av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>objektet som representerer den øverste personsøker raden i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The TopPagerRow property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control creates the bottom pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I TopPagerRow-egenskapen er tilgjengelig etter at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen oppretter nederste personsøker rad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the top pager row, for example when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis når du skal endre programmatisk raden øverste personsøker, for eksempel når du legger til egendefinert innhold.

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the TopPagerRow property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control will overwrite any changes.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i egenskapen TopPagerRow må utføres etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen er gjengitte; motsatt fall, av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll, overskrives alle endringer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> that represents the top pager row in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> som representerer den øverste personsøker raden i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Marks the starting point to begin tracking and saving view-state changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Merker utgangspunkt for å begynne å spore og lagre visningsstatus endringer i <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden to mark the starting point to begin tracking and saving changes to the control as part of the control's view state.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden overstyres for å merke utgangspunkt for å begynne å spore og lagre endringene til kontrollen som en del av kontrollens visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: Updates the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer gjeldende oppføring i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in edit mode, use the UpdateItem method to programmatically update the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen er i redigeringsmodus, bruker du UpdateItem-metoden til å oppdatere programmatisk gjeldende oppføring i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used when you need to update the current record from outside of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, such as from a different control on the page.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes vanligvis når du trenger å oppdatere oppføringen til gjeldende fra utenfor den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollere, for eksempel fra en annen kontroll på siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control must be in edit mode when this method is called; otherwise, an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen må være i redigeringsmodus når denne metoden er kall; ellers, en <xref:System.Web.HttpException>unntak.</xref:System.Web.HttpException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: To specify whether page validation is performed before the update operation, use the `causesValidation` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi om siden valideringen utføres før oppdateringen, kan du bruke den `causesValidation` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method also raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdated> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating> events.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden også hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdated>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating>hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdated>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to perform page validation when the method is called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å utføre siden når metoden kalles; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method on the page that is called when the control performs an update operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på metoden på siden som kalles når kontrollen utfører en oppdateringsoperasjon.

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: For en opplæring serie på ved hjelp av modellen binding med webskjema, kan du se [modellen bindingen og webskjema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).

trans-unit.source: The name of the method on the page that is called when the control performs an update operation.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på metoden på siden som kalles når kontrollen utfører en oppdateringsoperasjon.
